did.unittitle: Association of Jesuit Colleges and Universities reports and other material
did.abstract: This is a collection of publications, reports, and correspondence sent to the President of Xavier University by the Association of Jesuit Colleges and Universities (previously known as the Jesuit Educational Association). Some Xavier-specific correspondence is included in the collection.

bioghist.head: History of Association Jesuit Colleges and Universities, formerly the Jesuit Educational Association
bioghist.p: The Association of Jesuit Colleges and Universities was created in 1970.

The Jesuit Educational Association was a national organization comprised of all the Jesuit secondary and post-secondary schools in the United States. In 1970 it divided into two organizations, the Association of Jesuit Colleges and Universities (AJCU) and the Jesuit Secondary Education Association (JSEA). According to the website of AJCU, the Jesuit Educational Association came into existence in 1936, although it seems to have existed on a regional level as early as 1923.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection includes documents including correspondence, bulletins, reports, questionnaires, surveys, minutes, and proceedings of various conferences. The earliest item of JEA item is dated 1923, the latest 1970. The earliest AJCU item is from 1970, the latest from 1972.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged chronologically into folders.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Some materials may have restricted access. Please contact the archives staff.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box number, Folder number, XUA-84, Association of Jesuit Colleges and Universities reports and other material, Special Collections and Archives, Xavier University, Cincinnati, Ohio.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
